short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swaps text on NOAA website to explain the meaning of Far Away.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a part of a larger studio art project by the artist Conor Murphy.  When activated this extension uses the NOAA.gov/about "What We Do" page to explain the meaning of Far Away.  Slight changes are made to the original websites text to instead explain the intentions of the Far Away project.  Rather than reading about ocean exploration and research, you learn about Far Away exploration and research.
